title: BRIEF-Goldstrike Appoints Daithi MacGearailt As New CEO
text:
BRIEF-Goldstrike Appoints Daithi MacGearailt As New CEO

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Sep 30, 2019 18:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Goldstrike Appoints Daithi MacGearailt As New CEO Sept 30 (Reuters) - Goldstrike Resources Ltd : * GOLDSTRIKE APPOINTS NEW CEO * SAYS CEO AND PRESIDENT TERRENCE E. KING RESIGNED * GOLDSTRIKE RESOURCES - EFFECTIVE IMMEDIATELY, MANAGEMENT HAS APPOINTED DAITHI MACGEARAILT TO ASSUME POSITIONS OF PRESIDENT, CEO AND DIRECTOR OF CO

BRIEF-Goldstrike Appoints Daithi MacGearailt As New CEO
description: BRIEF-Goldstrike Appoints Daithi MacGearailt As New CEO
